content: पार्वण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पर्वणि भवः अण्] {@--1@} Belonging or relating to a {%Parvan%}, falling on a Parva day, such as the full-moon, new-moon &c.; <ls>R. 11. 82</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Waxing, increasing (as the moon). --णं The ceremony of offering oblations to all the Manes at a {%Parvan%}.
